rawText:
MAGESHWARAN R 
 
 
mageshwaran951@gmail.com                 +918870627408                   Website | GitHub | LinkedIn | Medium
 
 
Seasoned AI Engineer with a distinguished seven-year tenure in designing and 
implementing advanced Natural Language Processing and Document Intelligence 
systems. 
 
HIGHLIGHTS 
● NLP Lead for AstraZeneca’s ‘Lead with AI & Insights’ award-winning project 
● Design and Development of Million-scale Document Intelligence Solutions to create 
FAIR data in Pharmaceutical and Healthcare domains leveraging Semantic Search, 
Semantic QA, NER, Ontologies, Document Layout Understanding 
● Multilingual/Cross-lingual NLP solutions for Semantic Search and Content 
Generation in Pharmaceutical and Travel domains 
● Document Intelligence Solutions leveraging OCR, Visual Transformers, and CNNs 
to capture and digitize Tables, Flowcharts, and Plots 
● Experienced with MLOps Workflows in Kubernetes Native platforms, Sagemaker 
 
SKILLS 
NLP            :  Semantic Search, Retrieval Augmented Generation, 
      Agentic AI, LLMs, Generative AI, Named Entity Recognition 
Computer Vision   : Object Detection, Image Segmentation, Image Processing, OCR, 
  Data Cleaning and Augmentation 
Software Dev         : Python, Databases (Vector, Graph, NoSQL, SQL), Big Data Tools, 
     Docker, Kubernetes, Airflow 
EXPERIENCE 
SENIOR CONSULTANT – AI ENGINEERING                       DEC 2021 – PRESENT 
AstraZeneca                                                  Chennai, India 
● Leading the design, development, and delivery of Document Intelligence solutions 
to accelerate Clinical Study Design, Regulatory Submissions, Health Authority 
Interactions, and Patient Safety processes 
● Led the development and delivery of million-scale RAG pipeline for Clinical Study 
documents with Azure OpenAI, Qdrant and custom frameworks for LLM Response 
Verification, Guardrails to accelerate clinical study design, patient recruitment as 
part of Study Patients Initiative saving 12K FTE hours with a projection of 2.5M 
USD savings in 5 years 
● Led the development and delivery of Information Extraction and Metadata Tagging 
solutions using custom NER models, LLMs and Controlled Vocabularies for the 
FAIRification of 2M+ Regulatory and Clinical Study documents saving 28K FTE 
hours 
● Developed a PoC on multi-agent workflow to automate study feasibility analysis by 
generating RWE queries from free-text eligibility criteria - helping the study 
feasibility analysis with a real-time feedback loop (process that usually takes many 
hours of manual efforts) 

● Consulting a project on a multi-agent clinical development chat assistant that’s 
connected to various knowledge bases (semantic search) and data products 
(text2sql) powered by AWS Bedrock and OpenSearch 
● Delivered Document Understanding solutions to extract study design flowchart 
images and schedule of assessments tables using PubLayNet and Table 
Transformers 
AI  ENGINEER (Founding Team)                             FEB 2021 – NOV 2021 
YOU. Group HK                                                  Remote, India 
● Developed Multilingual NLP pipelines for Sentiment Classification of Tourism 
Reviews, Cross-lingual Semantic Similarity, and Semantic Search for Tourism 
Products Analytics 
● Implemented end-to-end multilingual search application for the tourism industry 
using Elasticsearch 
● Architected ETL and Data QA solutions using AWS services like S3, GLUE, 
Redshift, Lambda, SNS, and MongoDB for Data Warehousing of Tourism Products 
and Reviews data collected from different sources. 
 
AI ENGINEER (Early member in AI Group)                 AUG 2019 – FEB 2021 
Concord Nextstep India Pvt Ltd         Chennai, India 
● Research and Development of Information Extraction Systems for Electronic Health 
Records 
● Research and Implementation of Named Entity Recognition models ranging from 
hand-engineered feature-based CRF to State-Of-The-Art Deep Learning models 
(BERT, CNN-BiLSTM-CRF with Word, Subword representations, and 
Character-level embeddings) 
● Research work on Document Layout Understanding using LayoutLM and 
PubLayNet and leveraging it for downstream task of entity-extraction 
● Understanding of Design and Development of end-to-end data-driven business 
products (Data streaming, Orchestration, Micro-services, Model deployments, and 
scaling with Kubernetes, and Azure cloud services) 
 
PROJECT ENGINEER                FEB 2018 – AUG 2019 
WIPRO Technologies - Automotive domain              Bengaluru, India 
Deep Learning Engineer: Computer Vision & AI team, Visteon 
● Responsible for Research and Implementation of State-of-the-Art techniques in 
DCNN which includes Importance sampling, Algorithm Optimization 
● Responsible for Hyper-parameter tuning of Deep Convolutional Neural Networks for 
Lane Detection and Traffic Sign Recognition 
● Worked on end-to-end Computer Vision pipeline: Data pre-processing (Data 
Augmentation, Data cleaning), Data post-processing (Data Summarization, Error 
Analysis) and Fine-tuning 
Machine Learning Engineer: Ford Motor Company 
● Worked on End-to-End development and deployment of Machine Learning and 
Text-Analytics based Defect Classifier 
● Customized an Open-Source Python Static Code Analyser "Pylint" and Integrated it 
with, Pycharm and Squish (Automation tool) 
EDUCATION 
B.Tech in Electrical and Electronics Engineering, R.M.K College of Engineering and 
Technology: WIPRO Campus recruit SEP-2016, Graduated 2017
